## Worker.pause() method

Pauses the processing of this queue only for this worker.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pause(doNotWaitActive?: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  doNotWaitActive | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
